text: Nishada is a tribe mentioned in ancient Indian literature (such as the epic Mahabharata). The ancient texts mention several kingdoms ruled by this tribe. In the Mahabharata, the Nishadas are described as hunters, fishermen, mountaineers or raiders that have the hills and the forests as their abode. ==References== Category:Adivasi Category:Himalayan peoples Category:Indigenous peoples of South Asia Category:Social groups of India Category:Ethnic groups in India Category:Karakoram
